ProfileError.c: First you must enter or select the profile name.

DevelMess.c: This feature is in development! Look for updates of the project.

FileTransfer_5.c: Link file: %s_r_%s_r_[ File sent through a %s. Filesize: %s ]

FileTransfer_6.c: Transfer of the previous file is not finished yet!_r_Please wait.

GtransErr_2.c: You must first select the language for the translation!

NewVerYES.c: We find the new version IMadering._r__r_To view go to the website www.imadering.com

NewVerErr.c: Error obtaining data the new version.

UpDateOK.c: The update is complete._r__r_To complete the update, you must restart the program IMadering!

TwitPostOK.c: Your message was successfully published on your %s page.

LoginParams.c: Before you connect to the %s server, first enter your account and password!

ParsingPktError.c: Failed to parse the data received from the server.

ConnectError.c: The connection to %s is not established.

AccountX.c: Your account %s used on another computer.

NoPassChange.c: Password for %s not changed. Current or new password is entered incorrectly.

OnlineAlert.c: To perform this action, you must first connect to the %s server.

HistoryDell.c: Are you sure you want to delete the history of communications?

UserCloseChat.c: The interlocutor closed the chat window!

InfoSaveOK.c: Your data is successfully updated on the server %s.

EmailCount.c: You have in box %s unread messages!_r__r_All %s messages in the box.

NoAdmin.c: You do not have permission to write files!_r_Administrator rights are required.

NewProgErr.c: Can not start another profile program.

HistoryCompressed.c: Created archive of the history of communications. To view previous history of messages, open the archive to view history.

DellContact.c: Contact "%s" to be removed. Are you sure?

AddGroupOK.c: Group successfully added to your list of contacts!

AddGroupErr_1.c: This group already exists in your contact list.

DellGroup.c: The group "%s" will be removed. Are you sure?

DellGroupOK.c: Group successfully deleted from your contact list!

AddContactOK.c: The contact was successfully added to your list of contacts!

AddContactErr_1.c: Such a contact already exists in your contact list.

AddContactErr_2.c: Please wait until the end of the previous operation with the server list of contacts.

AddContactErr_3.c: First create at least one group.

URLOpenErr.c: Browser to open the link was not found._r_Link copied to the clipboard.

HistoryNotFile.c: The history of communications with the contact no.

DellYourSelf.c: Remove myself from contacts list: %s._r_Are you sure?

ProxyConErr_1.c: Wrong username or password for the proxy.

LogException1.c: An error happened in the IMadering program

LogException2.c: You can copy information about this error and lay out for developers on the forum of project IMadering with description of actions which this error was at. Or to advise about an error in any other way.

ShortURL.c: Short reference of URL: "%s" copied in the clipboard.

DellContactOK.c: Contact was successfully removed from your contact list!

LangsSpeedButton.h: _b_Interface language_d__r_Choose the localization of the program

DellProfileSpeedButton.h: _b_Delete profile_d__r_Remove the profile folder from the hard disk

OpenProfilesSpeedButton.h: _b_Profile folder_d__r_Open the profile folder for remove or copying

ICQDumpSpeedButton.h: _b_Dumps ICQ_d__r_Enable or disable_r_the display of log data protocol

MRADumpSpeedButton.h: _b_Dumps MRA_d__r_Enable or disable_r_the display of log data protocol

WriteLogSpeedButton.h: _b_An entry in the log_d__r_Allow or pause the recording of events in the log

SendEmailSpeedButton.h: _b_Send by E-mail_d__r_Send all or selected text to the developers

RosterSpeedButton.h: _b_Unload roster_d__r_Save the database of contacts in the file

CLSearchONMenu.c: Button - Search the list of contacts

TopModeToolButton.h: _b_Always on top_d__r_Enable or disable window mode

AutoUpdateCheckBox.c: Check for new version at startup

EventsGroupBox.c: Setting alerts on events in the program

ProxyGroupBox.c: Set up a connection through a proxy

SoundOffForStatusCheckBox.c: Don't play sounds if my status is Occupied or Not Available

SoundAlwaysUniqCheckBox.c: Always play unique settings sounds of contacts

NoShowProfileFormCheckBox.c: Don't show Profile selection on start up

NoTaskBarMainButtonCheckBox.c: Do not show contacts list window on the taskbar.

SendDump.c: Warning this feature is designed for very experienced users. Use it only if you know exactly what you are doing. The consequences could be unpredictable.

About.c: IMadering is a graphical messaging client which is capable of connecting to ICQ, XMPP, Twitter and MRA all at once. It is written using Delphi 2010. Project with open source._r__r_You may modify and redistribute the program under the terms of the GPL (version 2 or later). A copy of the GPL is contained in the file distributed with IMadering. IMadering is copyrighted by its contributors. We provide no warranty for this program.

ClientId.c: Warning! These settings are for advanced users. If you do not know what it is, please leave everything as is. Change the customer ID may make certain features unavailable or cause unstable operation of the program.

PassChange.c: To change your password, you must enter your current password and new password twice. It is strongly recommended to use the new password a combination of numbers and letters of the alphabet. Your password must be between 6 to 8 characters.

Language.c: English._r_Author: Eduard Tolmachev._r__r_Don't see your native language? Please visit the IMadering website and look for it there. If you have translated IMadering into your language and would like to share it with other users, feel free to post the translation in our forum http://imadering.mybb.ru_r_Date: 27.01.2010

c0.c: Author of the project and lead programmer;Eduard Tolmachev

CurTrafLabel.c: Current session (incoming | outgoing | counting from date):

NotPreviousClearCheckBox.c: Do not clear the previous results

KeySoundToolButton.h: _b_Sound keys_d__r_Enable or disable the voice acting keystrokes

ShowAwayTimeCheckBox.c: Allow others to see how long I've been idle

AutoReqAuthCheckBox.c: Automatically send authorization request on adding contact

YesAutoAuthRadioButton.c: All users can add me without authorization (Always)

ShowWebAwareCheckBox.c: Allow others to see my status in search and from the web

ClientCapsLabel.c: You can add here 3 client capability strings (max 16 chars):

SaveHistoryCheckBox.c: Always save message history for this contact

CustomServerCheckBox.c: Manually specify the server address and port

InfoLabel.c: Updated periodically on the server list of available games
